extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version for CVE-2022-22965
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system meets the specific requirements to be affected by CVE-2022-22965, including JDK 9 or higher, Apache Tomcat as the Servlet container, packaged as WAR, and specific Spring Framework versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-22965?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Workaround for CVE-2022-22965
extracted_playbook.description: If patching is not immediately possible, extend RequestMappingHandlerAdapter to update the WebDataBinder at the end after all other initialization.

extracted_playbook.title: Test Susceptibility for CVE-2022-22965
extracted_playbook.description: Use Randori Attack Team's non-malicious request to test the susceptibility for this vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Spring Framework
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to Spring Framework versions 5.3.18 or 5.2.20 to address CVE-2022-22965.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version for CVE-2022-22963
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is using Spring Cloud Function versions 3.1.6, 3.2.2, or older unsupported versions to determine if it is affected by CVE-2022-22963.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-22963?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Spring Cloud Function
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to Spring Cloud Function version 3.1.7+ or 3.2.3+ to mitigate CVE-2022-22963.

affected_products: VMware Tanzu Application Service for VMs – versions 2.10 to 2.13
VMware Tanzu Operations Manager – versions 2.8 to 2.10
VMware Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Integrated Edition (TKGI) – versions 1.11 to 1.13
